title-group.article-title: Correction: Proceedings of the Patient Reported Outcome Measures (PROMs) Research Conference, Sheffield 2023
title-group.subtitle: 22nd June 2023, University of Sheffield, Sheffield, UK

body.p: The copyright holder for this article was incorrectly given as ‘© The Author(s), under exclusive licence to Springer Nature Switzerland AG 2025’ but should have been ‘© Author(s) 2025’.
The original article has been corrected.

fn.p: The original article can be found online at 10.1007/s11136-024-03887-7.
Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
The original article can be found online at 10.1007/s11136-024-03887-7.
